```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
Sys.setenv(LANG = "en")
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(readxl)
library(qwraps2)
library(writexl)


```




```{r}
df=readRDS("df_clean.rds")%>%select(-starts_with("p_"))%>%mutate(year=year(date), month=month(date))%>%group_by(code,year,month)%>%arrange(date)%>%summarise(data_date=max(date), OKS=last(OKS), participation=last(participation),contribution=last(contribution),code=last(code), fund_type=last(fund_type), category=last(category), name=last(name), price=last(price), shares=last(shares), people=last(people), total_value=last(total_value), company_code=last(company_code), company_name=last(company_name))%>%mutate(date=ymd(str_c(year,month,"1",sep="-")))

```


```{r}
write_rds(df,"monthly_fund_data.rds")
write_xlsx(df,"monthly_fund_data.xlsx")
```
